entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
